name: Irresistible Veggie Dip Recipe
description: This TRIED + TRUE veggie dip will have everyone begging for the recipe! Get the secret that makes this vegetable dip stand above the rest!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon parsley dried (if using fresh, triple the amount!)
2 tablespoons onion flakes (also called dried minced onion)
instructions: Combine sour cream, mayonnaise, parsley, garlic powder, onion flakes, seasoning, parmesan cheese and sugar. Fold in mozzarella cheese. Refrigerate 2+ hours. Serve with vegetables and or crackers.
